item.description:
40% off Mt. Sunapee

Friday Jan. 20th. anytime after 9am.

Mt Sunapee rt.103

New Berry NH.

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962

Carpooling from Nashua, Manchester & Concord NH.

Steve O. wrote:  Please take the day off, and join me, and my friends, for a day of skiing or riding. I am a PSIA ski instructor and will be happy to help, if asked. We ski and ride at any level. Skiing and riding weekdays are the best way to go. The parking lots, the lodges, and the trails are almost empty. So, we don't have to park and carry our equipment miles away from the lodge. We don't have to fight for a seats, or to walk in the lodge. We have it to our selves, and the trails too. There is usually little to no lift lines. Plus, there is usually some discount on the lift tickets. We get so much more for our money and our time, than the weekends.     I will be carpooling from exit 8 in Nashua park & ride, & exit 10 off of rt.93 Target store in Hooksett NH., and exit 1 park & ride off of rt 89. If you can't make it to ride up with us?Then meet us their.

Skiers,

    Please get or rent a helmet and goggles. If you don't already have them. They are a very important part of your ski equipment. If you ski with us without those pieces? because I am a PSIA ski instructor. You will hear me talk all day about what I have seen and what happens to those who ski without a helmet.  Where everyone is almost going out of control, and they are all proud that they have sharpened edges on their skies. You protect yourself from the cold. But you don't protect the most important part of your body? Your head, and eyes. A helmet and goggles can be rented or  purchased from $10 to $100. When you brake an arm it will heal. But, it may work fun, If you brake your head. It may heal. But you will not be the same person. Isn't your life worth more than that? I have a helmet and goggles or two, that I will be happy to lend out. If I am asked?

            Steve O1b.

If you join the Golf & Ski Warehouse and get their All Star Rewards Card (free). You can join us and get $40 off weekday lift tickets. You can find their store online.  http://www.golfskiwarehouse.com/rewards_benefits.aspx

All-Star Rewards Benefits

Join Our All-Star Team!

Earn points with every purchase for life, plus enjoy
exclusive member benefits, promotions, and savings.

We’ll Reward Your Every Purchase At a Rate of 3.5%
As a member of the Golf & Ski All-Star Rewards Program, you will earn 1 point for every dollar you spend on qualifying purchases in-store and online at www.golfskiwarehouse.com. As soon as you accumulate a minimum of 300 points, rewards credits will be posted to your rewards program account in the amount of 3.5% of your total purchases – retroactive to your enrollment date.
Rewards credits may be redeemed for store credit only and have no cash value.

Your Points Never Expire… And You Never Have to Re-qualify
Unlike other retail rewards programs, your All-Star Rewards points never expire and your rewards credit is good until you use it. And once you accumulate 300 points, you will be a qualified All-Star Rewards member for life, eligible for exclusive benefits.

Enjoy Exclusive Benefits With Us
As a Golf & Ski All-Star, you’ll receive a host of exclusive benefits, including:

  • notice of special events before the general public
  • invitations to special golf and ski demo days
  • half price ski tunes
  • free grip installation ($1.00 off per grip)
  • free replacement spike installation
  • free state-of-the-art computer fitting sessions
  • double point promotions
  • free shipping (restrictions apply)

And Special Offers from Our Partners
You’ll have exclusive access to special promotions and discounts from our golf and snow sports partners… and be entered into exclusive drawings for All-Star members only to win golf and ski trips to our partner resorts.
See our current partner program offers!

This Season, Become an All-Star and Increase Your Value!
Enroll in our All-Star Rewards program today—and enjoy all the perks of your newfound stardom.

As an All-Star Rewards Member, Enjoy These Exclusive Mountain Resort Partner Discounts for the 2011-2012 Winter Season

For more details click on the links below.

Burke Mountain
East Burke, Vermont
40% off midweek adult lift tickets or $10.00 off weekend adult lift tickets.

Mount Sunapee Resort
Newbury, New Hampshire
40% off a mid-week, non-holiday period one-day lift ticket or $10.00 off a weekend or holiday period one-day lift ticket.

Okemo Mountain Resort (ONLINE OFFER ONLY)
Ludlow, Vermont
25% off a mid-week, non-holiday period one-day lift ticket or $10.00 off a weekend or holiday period one-day lift ticket.

Shawnee Peak (ONLINE OFFER ONLY)
Bridgton, Maine
$10.00 off a one-day adult lift ticket, $5.00 off a one-day junior lift ticket, $6.00 off all night lift tickets!

Saddleback Mountain
Rangeley, Maine
$10.00 off a weekday, non-holiday period one-day lift ticket*

THE Ride & Ski Card
All-Star Rewards members save $5.00 off the regular purchase price of THE Ride & Ski Card.
